mapper.sql: id, user_id, group_id, group_title, score, result_desc, update_by, update_time, create_by, create_time, is_deleted
mapper.select: select * from user_check_result_history where user_id = #{userId} and is_deleted=0 order by create_time desc

select
distinct
from user_check_result_history
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user_check_result_history (id, user_id, group_id, group_title, score, result_desc, update_by, update_time, create_by, create_time, is_deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resultDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT})
